wreath.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a circle made from leaves or flowers that you put on the place where a person is buried
wreath.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The prime minister laid a wreath at the war memorial.
wreath.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a circle of leaves or flowers that people use to decorate their houses at Christmas
wreath.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a circle made from leaves that a person wore on their head in the past as a sign of honour
